### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23035](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23035) (p2p, rpc, test: expose tried and refcount in getnodeaddresses, up

Code review ACK b69a106bcd8ddefdb810df6ebb3625c430197e04
I think it's good to use a constant for the default service flags, if there is no reason to specifically deviate from them.

> It may also be a tiny bit more efficient to use the constant 

Bitwise OR is one of the most efficient operations to perform on a CPU. Also, none of these are in inner loops. I strongly doubt this figures i
(Thanks!) Yes, that definitely was not the main argument for it :)
